item.description:
Dear westborough Spirituality Meetup member,

How are you?

In May we had a wonderful discussion. Thanks for all of sharing of your experience and input. It was a great meeup.

Last month we discuss about how to create the peace in the world though ourself first. As an old saying: A thousand miles begins with one step. Everyday we face a lot of people, all of these relationship is a resources for us to create good energy. If we start sending out the peaceful energy to the world, this world will become much better.

Thanks for all of your's sharing that we can do a lot of things from a little friendly smile to helping others. If we can transform our mindset, than everything around us could be very different. I am the one starting the peaceful energy and I am also the one stopping the vicious cycle. Even it is a tinny thing, but it may makes a huge different.

This month, we are going to share and discuss more about what we can do for this world. How can we make this world more peaceful and how can I do in my daily life to change. Butterfly effect, every small step counts.

If you would like to meet more friends with the same interest about seeking a spiritual life, please come and share your thoughts and experiences about how to practice spirituality in daily life.

Enjoy the day and letâ€™s create positive energy to the whole world. Hope see you all in our meetup.
If weather is nice, we may can take a little walk after. Let's have some fun!
item.how_to_find_us: The building will be second on the right when you coming to Condos, you may park any place with visitor parking sign
item.name: Westborough Spiritual July Meetup
